title: How to Fold an Origami Parrot

steps.title: Start off with a piece of paper color side down.
steps.content: Start off with a piece of paper color side down. Fold one of the corners in half to the opposite corner and make a crease. Then, unfold the corner.

steps.title: Fold one of the corners so it is in line with the crease.
steps.content: Fold one of the corners so it is in line with the crease. Repeat on other side. Unfold.

steps.title: Fold the same corners but on a different side upwards.
steps.content: Fold the same corners but on a different side upwards. Unfold.

steps.title: Fold down all creases you just made towards the center then, fold the excess triangle parts down.
steps.content: Fold down all creases you just made towards the center then, fold the excess triangle parts down.

steps.title: Fold both triangles in half outwards.
steps.content: Fold both triangles in half outwards. Then, valley fold along main crease.

steps.title: Fold top point downwards on an angle then back up again.
steps.content: Fold top point downwards on an angle then back up again. Unfold,.

steps.title: Fold down top point.
steps.content: Fold down top point. Unfold. Then inside fold.

steps.title: Fold down side point.
steps.content: Fold down side point. Unfold. Then inside fold.

steps.title: Fold side point.
steps.content: Fold side point. Unfold. Then inside fold downwards to complete the beak.

steps.title: Fold tail on an angle.
steps.content: Fold tail on an angle. Unfold. Then inside fold.

steps.title: Fold up side part to create a wing.
steps.content: Fold up side part to create a wing. Repeat on other side.

steps.title: Fold over side part of tail.
steps.content: Fold over side part of tail. Repeat on other side.

steps.title: Finished.
steps.content: Finished. Your completed origami parrot should look like this.
